issue.title: [C++][FlightRPC] Expand common test suite
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15932](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15932). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implementing the UCX transport (https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12442) has revealed some things that could be improved in the gRPC transport/common test suite, we should split those out into their own PR to keep the UCX PR more manageable.
